article.title: Textron Systems to Provide Mobile Directional Antenna Systems
article.text: Textron Systems, Hunt Valley, Maryland, was awarded a $6,640,731 modification (P00023) to contract W58RGZ-13-C-0016 to procure 104 Mobile Directional Antenna Systems in support of the One System Remote Video Systems. Fiscal 2015 operations and maintenance (Army) and fiscal 2014 other procurement funds in the amount of $6,640,731 were obligated at the time of the award. Estimated completion date is January 30, 2016. Work will be performed in Hunt Valley, Maryland. The Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
